{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which options are used for postpartum hemorrhage, we need to search for information on the treatment of postpartum hemorrhage. Document [2] mentions that active management of the third stage of labor should be used routinely to reduce the incidence of postpartum hemorrhage. Based on this information, the answer is A. Misoprostol.", "answer_choice": "A"}
